name: Inheritors
description:
I N H E R I T O R S

A brief look at the "uncontacted" Akuntsu tribe in southern Brazilian Amazon, what it means to give up heritage, and what their story means for similar tribes.

Lay down a short heritage of your own and see how your actions echo on the land you live.

Built & tested on keyboard and Xbox (360/One) controller. You may have luck on other controllers as well.

Submitted to the Games For Change Festival 2021.

Special thanks to Steve Engels who guided the project and provided feedback at every stage of development.

NOTE: All proceeds of donations for this game will be passed on as donations to Survival International. Donate here or directly to Survival International.
